fields.name: ChargeType
fields.description: The type of the charge. Could be actual or forecast

fields.name: ConfidenceLevels
fields.description: The details about the forecast confidence levels. This is populated only when chargeType is Forecast.

fields.name: Currency
fields.description: The ISO currency in which the meter is charged, for example, USD.

fields.name: Grain
fields.description: The granularity of forecast. Please note that Yearly is not currently supported in this API. The API will provide responses in the Monthly grain if Yearly is selected. To get yearly grain data, please use our newer Forecast API.

fields.name: UsageDate
fields.description: The usage date of the forecast.
